thread.title: Sri Lanka: Tourism grows 35.9 percent

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Sri Lanka: Tourism grows 35.9 percent
text:
Sri Lanka: Tourism grows 35.9 percent     
COLOMBO, Sri Lanka - Sri Lanka's Tourism recorded the highest growth of 35.9% in September whilst tourism receipts reached 2.1 billion dollars as at end September 2015 which is the upturn we have seen with strong promotions done by a private-public partnership. 
The Sri Lanka Tourism Promotions Bureau chairman Dr Athukorala opinioned that the key issue to address is the un-control sector leisure industry accounting for 49% of business whilst it's imperative that we focus on attracting the $250 tourist ensure financial sustainability.
